titleStmt.title: For the Lord Protector. I stand amazed to see, that from June last, the time I communicated unto you the matter of this book, ...
titleStmt.author: Gostelo, Walter.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening line of text.
Dated and signed at end: 22. of January 1655. Walter Gostelo.
Annotation on Thomason copy: the date at end has the final '5' crossed out and replaced with a "4".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
